entry.title: Archive Post 19: Alphabetical Archives Posts
entry.content:
POSTS:
1. Ads: 1 files
2. Articles: 27 files
3. Australian Sahaja Newsletter: Total files 100
     3.1. Australian Sahaja Newsletter, Part 1 (1997): 8 files
     3.2. Australian Sahaja Newsletter, Part 2 (1998): 48 files (includes 3 supplements)
     3.3. Australian Sahaja Newsletter, Part 3 (1999): 43 files (includes 2 supplements)
     3.4. Australian Sahaja Newsletter Part 4 (2000): 1 file
4. Divine Cool Breeze (USA): 2 files
5. Letters and Press Releases: 5 files
6. Newsletter Australia: 3 files
7. Official Photos with Text: 1 file
8. Posters: 14 files
9. Publications Related to Offerings: 1 file
10. Sahaj Patrika (Hindi): 1 file
11. Sahaja Newsletter (Australia): Total files 87
     11.1. Sahaja Newsletter (Australia), Part 1 (1991): 5 files
     11.2. Sahaja Newsletter (Australia), Part 2 (1992): 48 files (includes 8 supplements)
     11.3. Sahaja Newsletter (Australia), Part 3 (1993): 34 files (includes 2 supplements)
12. Sahaja Yoga Australian Newsletter: Total files 148
     12.1. Sahaja Yoga Australian Newsletter, Part 1 (2000): 33 files
     12.2. Sahaja Yoga Australian Newsletter, Part 2 (2001): 15 files
     12.3. Sahaja Yoga Australian Newsletter, Part 3 (2002): 42 files
     12.4. Sahaja Yoga Australian Newsletter, Part 4 (2003): 41 files
     12.5. Sahaja Yoga Australian Newsletter, Part 5 (2004): 16 files
     12.5. Sahaja Yoga Australian Newsletter, Part 6 (2005): 1 file
13. The Australian Sahaja Newsletter: Total files 153
     13.1. The Australian Sahaja Newsletter, Part 1 (1993): 14 files
     13.2. The Australian Sahaja Newsletter, Part 2 (1994): 39 files
     13.3. The Australian Sahaja Newsletter, Part 3 (1995): 36 files
     13.4. The Australian Sahaja Newsletter, Part 4 (1996): 37 files (includes 1 supplement)
     13.5. The Australian Sahaja Newsletter, Part 5 (1997): 27 files
14. The Australian Sahaja Yoga Newsletter: Total files 67
     14.1. The Australian Sahaja Yoga Newsletter, Part 1 (2005): 17 files
     14.2. The Australian Sahaja Yoga Newsletter, Part 2 (2006): 17 files
     14.3. The Australian Sahaja Yoga Newsletter, Part 3 (2007): 15 files
     14.4. The Australian Sahaja Yoga Newsletter, Part 4 (2008): 7 files
     14.5. The Australian Sahaja Yoga Newsletter, Part 5 (2009): 11 files
15. The Life Eternal Trust India Annual Magazines and Souvenirs: 3 files
16. The Sahaj Patrika (ISPS, English): 1 file

SPECIAL POSTS:
S1. Articles Honoring Sir C.P.: 4 files

entry.title: Archive Post 20: The Australian Sahaja Yoga Newsletter, Part 5 (2009)

link.title: Archive Post 20: The Australian Sahaja Yoga Newsletter, Part 5 (2009)

entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

This post will share issues of The Australian Sahaja Yoga Newsletter published in the 5th year (2009) and received or scanned by the team. This publication was a natural continuation of the Australian Sahaja Yoga Newsletter.

Please enjoy and kindly share with all our brothers and sisters. If files are downloaded using the download buttons/arrows, please kindly do not change the names of the files (modulo replacements of underscores by spaces).

This is a joint project with Kannan Subrahmanyan from Australia.
For Part 1 (2005), please see Part 1.
For Part 2 (2006), please see Part 2.
For Part 3 (2007), please see Part 3.
For Part 4 (2008), please see Part 4.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Archives Subteam
sahajayoga.compilations@gmail.com
https://linktr.ee/comprehensivecompilationsteam

entry.title: Archive Post 18: Second Annual Report
entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

Here is the progress made in the last year (since the first annual report on 2023-0316), in relation to the Data Table and the Archive Posts.

Second Summary of the 14 numerical indices.
i. Rows of the Table: 1,932 (an increment of 652 rows, i.e., of 1.7814 rows per day).
ii. Organized rows left to be added to the Table: 1,228 (a decrement of 73).
iii. Estimated unorganized rows left to be added to the Table: 1,500 (no change).
iv. Specific posts: 15 (an increment of 13).
v. Estimated specific posts to be started: 135.
vi. Total links: 1,160 (an increment of 1,014).
vii. External Links: 680 (DCB: 141, SDL: 539) (an increment of 539).
viii. CCT Links: 480 (Collections: 466, CCT: 14) (an increment of 475, Collections: 466, CCT: 9).
ix. Total files uploaded (not including versions): 480 (an increment of 475).
x. Total pages uploaded or linked: 23,677 (an increment of 23,599).
xi. Other files (originals, received, etc.) uploaded (not counting versions): 458.
xii. Other pages uploaded: 2,908 (from the 458 files, an increment of 2,908).
xiii. Files scanned and cropped by CCT: 22 (an increment of 17).
xiv. Pages scanned and cropped by CCT: 213 (an increment of 135 pages).

We thank you in advance for any help, support, and feedback. Please write to us at sahajayoga.compilations@gmail.com

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Archives Subteam
entry.summary: Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs, Here is the progress made in the last year (since the first annual report on 2023-0316), in relation to the Data Table and the Archive Posts. Second Summary of the 14 numerical indices. i. Rows of the Table: 1,932 (an increment of 652 rows, i.e., of 1.7814 rows per day). ii. Organized rows left to be added to the Table: 1,228 (a decrement of 73). iii. Estimated unorganized rows left to be added to the Table: 1,500 (no change). iv. Specific posts: 15 (an increment of 13). v. Estimated specific posts to be started: 135. vi. Total links: 1,160 (an increment of 1,014). vii. External Links: 680 (DCB: 141, SDL: 539) (an increment of 539). viii. CCT Links: 480 (Collections: 466, CCT: 14) (an increment of 475, Collections: 466, CCT: 9). ix. Total files uploaded (not including versions): 480 (an increment of 475). x. Total pages uploaded or linked: 23,677 (an increment of 23,599). xi. Other files (originals, received, etc.) uploaded (not counting versions): 458. xii. Other pages uploaded: 2,908 (from the 458 files, an increment of 2,908). xiii. Files scanned and cropped by CCT: 22 (an increment of 17). xiv. Pages scanned and cropped by CCT: 213 (an increment of 135 pages). We thank you in advance for any help, support, and feedback. Please write to us at sahajayoga.compilations@gmail.com Jay Śhrī Mātājī! The Archives Subteam

entry.title: Archive Post 17: Ads
entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

This post will share ads received or scanned by the team.

Please enjoy and kindly share with all our brothers and sisters. If files are downloaded using the download buttons/arrows, please kindly do not change the names of the files (modulo replacements of underscores by spaces).

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Archives Subteam
sahajayoga.compilations@gmail.com
https://linktr.ee/comprehensivecompilationsteam

Ad1.

1988-0408 Ad ‘Felicitations to Her Holiness Shri Mataji Nirmaladeviji’ published in ‘The Times of India Bombay’, Mumbai, Maharashtra, India, Page 4 (Anna Mancini Collection) (1 page, scanned by CCT and uploaded on 2024-0121)
